UniprotID	Q86XR8-5
Accession	Q86XR8;A0PJH1;A8K5D0;B4DDP5;F5H5F7;Q14704;Q5JB46;Q8IXP0;Q9BVF9
EntryName	CEP57_HUMAN
ProteinName	Centrosomal protein of 57 kDa (Cep57) (FGF2-interacting protein) (Testis-specific protein 57) (Translokin)
GeneName	CEP57 KIAA0092 TSP57
Length	491
Function	Centrosomal protein which may be required for microtubule attachment to centrosomes. May act by forming ring-like structures around microtubules. Mediates nuclear translocation and mitogenic activity of the internalized growth factor FGF2, but that of FGF1.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Microtubule organizing center; Centrosome
Disorder
